title: Met Gala 2024: From Alia Bhatt to Isha Ambani, what Indians in attendance wore
content:
International media hyping Alia Bhatt by chanting her name at Met Gala 2024 red carpet pic.twitter.com/CLS9gJ3eFM— s (@bhattsupremacy) May 7, 2024


Alia Bhatt live on Vogue from the Met Gala. She’s wearing a Sabyasachi saree. She looks absolutely beautiful! 🤍✨#AliaBhatt #MetGala2024 pic.twitter.com/M3M8ETmdNQ— 🔗 (@mann_ke_fasane) May 6, 2024


Mona Patel incorporates moving butterflies for her #MetGala outfit. pic.twitter.com/thBoy7uheh— Pop Base (@PopBase) May 6, 2024
